page.title: 11An 11 Year Old Boy's Day
page.content: On{Tuesday}I get up at{8:00,}I go downstairs and make my breakfast and read my Beano. Afterwards I put on my shoes, collect my lunchbox and cross the road to walk to school. At{9:00}the bell rings and our first lesson is{maths.}Our next lesson is{music}for about one hour. We have another teacher to teach us{stories and{poems.}Afterwards we have sewing and then it is lunchtime. We then have{playtime}and sometimes help teachers. At{1:15}the bell goes to call us in. After lunch we have {P.E.}until{3:30. When I get home I either play out or do my homework. Then I have my tea and go out to play until{8:15;}then I come in, watch T.V., get undressed and then go to bed at{9:00}or{8:30.}
